At last! I’m ready to release the public beta-1 version of greeneStripe, a new theme for Wordpress! It’s still very much in the testing phase, but if you can cope with a few bugs then please feel free to download a copy and install it on your wordpress. It even includes support for Automattic’s Wordpress Widgets, which work very nicely once installed. Please post any bug reports / design ideas / slag-offs here rather than on the theme blog! Thank you!
